mapper.insert: insert into t_backlog ( backlog_id, backlog_module_id, backlog_type, backlog_status, backlog_title, backlog_deadline, backlog_create_time ) values ( #{id}, #{moduleId}, #{type}, #{status}, #{title}, #{deadLine}, now() )
mapper.select: select b.*, m.module_name from t_backlog b left join t_module m on b.backlog_module_id = m.module_id
